name: simd_ushort8
desc: A vector of eight 16-bit unsigned integer elements.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(simd_ushort2) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified two-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(simd_ushort3) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified three-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(simd_ushort4) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified four-element vector, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(simd_ushort8) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(simd_ushort16) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified sixteen-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(simd_ushort32) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector by truncating the specified thrity two-element vector.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(simd_ushort4, simd_ushort4) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

items.name: func vector8(simd_ushort4, simd_ushort4) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vectors.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8_undef(simd_ushort2) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified two-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8_undef(simd_ushort3) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified three-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8_undef(simd_ushort4) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified four-element vector, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8(UInt16) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements set to zero.

items.name: func simd_make_ushort8_undef(UInt16) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector with the first element set to a scalar value, and other elements undefined.

items.name: func simd_ushort(simd_char8) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a new vector from the specified vector of 8-bit, signed integer elements.

items.name: func simd_clamp(simd_ushort8, simd_ushort8, simd_ushort8) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns each element in a vector clamped to a specified range.

items.name: func simd_equal(simd_ushort8, simd_ushort8) -> simd_bool
items.desc: Returns true if every element in a vector is exactly equal to the corresponding element in a second vector, and otherwise returns false.

items.name: func simd_reduce_min(simd_ushort8) -> UInt16
items.desc: Returns the miniumum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_max(simd_ushort8) -> UInt16
items.desc: Returns the maximum value in a vector.

items.name: func simd_reduce_add(simd_ushort8) -> UInt16
items.desc: Returns the sum of all elements in a vector.

items.name: func simd_min(simd_ushort8, simd_ushort8) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns the minimum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_max(simd_ushort8, simd_ushort8) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns the maximum value of each element in a vector.

items.name: func simd_bitselect(simd_ushort8, simd_ushort8, simd_short8) -> simd_ushort8
items.desc: Returns a vector that contains elements from either the first or second parameter, based on the corresponding element in the third parameter.
